channel.title: Enough is enough
channel.description:
Tom or Zuppers please take charge and fix the server. We've waited long enough and now I'm going to have to start annoying you until it's all fixed and we've updated to 1.4.6. I'll post a list of things I know are broken that need fixing urgently.
- Separate inventories in the nether and end. - Random emptying of ender chests, I don't know if that happend because of the pvp world but it need looked into. - Over sensitive cheating mod/ it detects speed hacking when running on ice. It also detects hacking when I pillar up. Also the quick place blocks is too sensitive I get told to wait lots of times when building because of it.
Most of all we need to update to 1.4.6 already.. It's been long enough..

item.title: Enough is enough
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We’re now running 1.4.7, I’ve done a slight testing this morning and stuff seems to work. I need to completely reconfigure the worldmap, so I’m working on that now.

working on it

Read full topic

item.title: Enough is enough
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The commands should now be fixed with PEX, but I’ve removed a few so gameplay is fairer.

Read full topic

item.title: Enough is enough
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Thanks Tom great work!

Read full topic

item.title: Enough is enough
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve updated the server to 1.4.5, but the worldmap is being difficult so that will be sorted out tomorrow (hopefully). I’ve tested the permissions on multiple levels and everything appears to be working this time. As for the other bugs, I’ve fixed the separate inventories and I’ve also fixed the nether issue with the PVP world where it doesn’t work so you can now travel to the nether naturally.

I’ll look at the ender chests tomorrow, probably.

Read full topic

item.title: Enough is enough

item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I agree and back Jamie on this 100%

Read full topic

item.title: Enough is enough
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Tom or Zuppers please take charge and fix the server. We’ve waited long enough and now I’m going to have to start annoying you until it’s all fixed and we’ve updated to 1.4.6. I’ll post a list of things I know are broken that need fixing urgently.

  • Separate inventories in the nether and end.
  • Random emptying of ender chests, I don’t know if that happend because of the pvp world but it need looked into.
  • Over sensitive cheating mod/ it detects speed hacking when running on ice. It also detects hacking when I pillar up. Also the quick place blocks is too sensitive I get told to wait lots of times when building because of it.

Most of all we need to update to 1.4.6 already… It’s been long enough…
